body_html:
Ah, this discrepancy is unfortunate. Thanks for pointing it out.

Alas, since this now part of the 1.x release - we can't get rid of the old names. However, we can perhaps add "input", "filter" and "strides" as arguments to conv1d.

I'll take a stab at that.

(Though, perhaps stride still makes sense since it is a single integer, not a list as in conv2d and conv3d?)
body_text:
Ah, this discrepancy is unfortunate. Thanks for pointing it out.
Alas, since this now part of the 1.x release - we can't get rid of the old names. However, we can perhaps add "input", "filter" and "strides" as arguments to conv1d.
I'll take a stab at that.
(Though, perhaps stride still makes sense since it is a single integer, not a list as in conv2d and conv3d?)
body:
Ah, this discrepancy is unfortunate. Thanks for pointing it out.

Alas, since this now part of the 1.x release - we can't get rid of the old names. However, we can perhaps add "input", "filter" and "strides" as arguments to conv1d.

I'll take a stab at that.

(Though, perhaps `stride` still makes sense since it is a single integer, not a list as in `conv2d` and `conv3d`?)
